A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible film. More worried about hitting quotas and being edgy then actually creating something that could be called a movie. Made u want to cover your face as u watched a director and script try and pay hommage to \"empowerment\" the result of which created cringy characters that were unreaistic and frankly quite sad. By making a point of \"empowering\" you are just revealing your own biases about the group u want to \"empower\". So sad! I pity you! I pity u because of the satisfaction it brings me.
